TCName.name: SalesColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedSales: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DTSG from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region') and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region') and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) z) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no
TCName.PlannedSalesWkToDt: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as PLN_SLS_WTD_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and TCName.PlannedSalesWkToDtTotal: select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as PLN_SLS_WTD_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT TCName.BudgetSales: select lc.zone_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_SALES_DTSG,0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_DTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no

TCName.ForecastSales: select lc.zone_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_SALES_DTSG,0) as FCST_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES_DTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ForecastSalesTotal: select lc.rgn_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSG,0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) fcst on lc.rgn_no=fcst.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no

TCName.PastWeekLYsales: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and TCName.PastWeekLYSalesTotal: select actl_cy.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct select src.zone_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_DTSR > src.BDGT_SLS_DTSR then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR * BDGT_SLS_DTSR) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSR - BDGT_SLS_DTSR) * (PST_FACTOR_DTSR * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_DTSR < src.BDGT_SLS_DTSR then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR * BDGT_SLS_DTSR) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSR - BDGT_SLS_DTSR) * (NGT_FACTOR_DTSR * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR * ACTL_SLS_DTSR)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_DTSR from
(select actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_DTSR,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_DTSR,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_DTSR, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_DTSR from
(select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_DTSR,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_DTSR,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_DTSR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSR, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSR, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR / sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no order by actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.zone_no

is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.rgn_no,pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.rgn_no order by h.rgn_no) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.rgn_no=bdgt.rgn_no group by lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.rgn_no=bdgt.rgn_no group by lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.rgn_no=bdgt_wge_pct.rgn_no order by actl_sls.rgn_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.rgn_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualSales: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS),0) as ACTL_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualSalesTotal: select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select TCName.CurrentWeekActualSalesWkToDt: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT TCName.CurrentWeekActualSalesWkToDtTotal: select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,ROUND((x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun),0) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, TCName.CurrentWeekLYsales: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + TCName.CurrentWeekLYSalesTotal: select actl_cy.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select TCName.CurrentWeekVarSalesTotal: select bdgt.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(estd.wtd - bdgt.wtd,0),0) as BDGT_VAR_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_SALES_TOT_DTSG,0) as wtd from (select distinct TCName.CurrentWeekForecastVarSalesTotal: select fcst.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(estd.wtd - fcst.wtd,0),0) as FCST_VAR_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSG,0) as wtd from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSG from (select b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) fcst on lc.rgn_no=fcst.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) fcst, (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select TCName.CurrentWeekAllowedWages:
select src.zone_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_DTSR > src.BDGT_SLS_DTSR then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR * BDGT_SLS_DTSR) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSR - BDGT_SLS_DTSR) * (PST_FACTOR_DTSR * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_DTSR < src.BDGT_SLS_DTSR then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR * BDGT_SLS_DTSR) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSR - BDGT_SLS_DTSR) * (NGT_FACTOR_DTSR * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR * ACTL_SLS_DTSR)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_DTSR from
(select actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_DTSR,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_DTSR,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_DTSR, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_DTSR from
(select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_DTSR,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_DTSR,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_DTSR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSR, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSR, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR / sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no order by actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekAllowedWagesTotal:
select src.rgn_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR > src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR * BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR - BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR) * (PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR < src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR * BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR - BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR) * (NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR * ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_TOT_DTSR from
(select actl_sls.rgn_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR from

actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.rgn_no order by h.rgn_no) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.rgn_no=bdgt.rgn_no group by lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.rgn_no=bdgt.rgn_no group by lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.rgn_no=bdgt_wge_pct.rgn_no order by actl_sls.rgn_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.rgn_no

TCName.name: ItemsColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedItems: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedItemsTotal: select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) z) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no
TCName.PlannedItemsWkToDt: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as PLN_ITM_WTD_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where TCName.PastWeekActualItemsWkToDtTotal: select lc.rgn_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as ACTL_ITM_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by TCName.PastWeekLYItems: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and TCName.PastWeekLYItemsTotal: select actl_cy.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and TCName.CurrentWeekLYItems: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSR)) Sat, TCName.CurrentWeekLYItemsTotal: select actl_cy.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSR)) Tue, mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and TCName.CurrentWeekVarItemsWkToDt: select pln.zone_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_ITM_WTD_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where TCName.name: CustomersColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedCustomers: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_CUST_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_CUST_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_CUST_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_CUST_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_CUST_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_CUST_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_CUST_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_CUST_DTS),0) as PLN_CUST_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_CUST_cnt) as PLN_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk,
