b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no order by pln.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarHoursWkToDtTotal: select pln.rgn_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG,2),0) as wtd from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no) pln, (select lc.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSR,2),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.rgn_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSR) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSR,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSR) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select h.rgn_no,h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no) h group by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no order by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no) f /* UNION select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.rgn_no order by actl_pln.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no) actl where pln.rgn_no=actl.rgn_no order by pln.rgn_no

TCName.name: CPHColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedCPH: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Mon_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Tue_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Wed_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Thu_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Fri_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Sat_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Sun_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_DTSR)) Mon_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_DTSR)) Tue_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_DTSR)) Wed_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_DTSR)) Thu_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_DTSR)) Fri_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_DTSR)) Sat_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_DTSR)) Sun_hrs from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DTSR,sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS) as PLN_HRS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.ta_pln_wage_amt!=0 and a.ta_pln_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) wge_hrs on lc.zone_no=wge_hrs.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedCPHTotal: select wge_hrs.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.rgn_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Mon_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Tue_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Wed_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Thu_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Fri_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Sat_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Sun_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR)) Mon_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR)) Tue_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR)) Wed_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR)) Thu_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR)) Fri_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR)) Sat_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR)) Sun_hrs from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.ta_pln_wage_amt!=0 and a.ta_pln_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) y on lc.rgn_no=y.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.rgn_no
TCName.PlannedCPHWkToDt: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSR / wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSR),2),0) END as PLN_CPH_WTD_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,ROUND(wge.PLN_WGE_DTSR,0) as PLN_WGE_DTSR,wge.PLN_HRS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WGE_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HRS_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PlannedCPHWkToDtTotal: select wge_hrs.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR / wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR),2),0) END as PLN_CPH_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,ROUND(wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,wge.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.rgn_no
TCName.PastWeekActualCPH: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Wed_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Thu_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Fri_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Mon_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Tue_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Wed_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Thu_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Fri_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Sat_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Sun_hrs from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),9) as ACTL_WGE_DTSR,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),9) as ACTL_HRS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on lc.zone_no=y.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualCPHTotal: select wge_hrs.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Wed_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Thu_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Fri_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Mon_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Tue_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Wed_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Thu_hrs, e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by ) y on lc.rgn_no=y.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.rgn_no
TCName.PastWeekActualCPHWkToDt: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wtd_wge / wge_hrs.wtd_hrs),2),0) END as ACTL_CPH_WTD_DTSR from (select wge.zone_no,wge.WTD_WGE,hrs.WTD_HRS from (select lc.zone_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSR as WTD_WGE from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select j.zone_no,sum(j.ACTL_WAGE_DTSR) as ACTL_WGE_DTSR,sum(j.ACTL_HOURS_DTSR) as ACTL_HRS_DTSR from (select * from (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) f /* UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Wed_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Thu_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Fri_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Mon_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Tue_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Wed_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Thu_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Fri_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Sat_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Sun_hrs from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),9) as ACTL_WGE_DTSR,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),9) as ACTL_HRS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on lc.zone_no=y.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualCPHTotal: select wge_hrs.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Wed_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Thu_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Fri_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Mon_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Tue_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Wed_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSR)),0) Thu_hrs, h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),9) as ACTL_WGE_DTSR,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),9) as ACTL_HRS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by TCName.CurrentWeekActualCPHWkToDt: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wtd_wge / wge_hrs.wtd_hrs),2),0) END as ACTL_CPH_WTD_DTSR from (select wge.zone_no,wge.WTD_WGE,hrs.WTD_HRS from (select lc.zone_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSR as WTD_WGE from e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and TCName.CurrentWeekVarCPHWkToDtTotal: select pln.rgn_no,ROUND(actl.wtd - pln.wtd,2) as VAR_CPH_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select wge_hrs.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR / wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR),2),0) END as WTD from (select lc.rgn_no,ROUND(wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR,wge.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge_hrs) pln, (select wge_hrs.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wtd_wge / wge_hrs.wtd_hrs),2),0) END as WTD from (select wge.rgn_no,wge.wtd_wge,hrs.wtd_hrs from (select lc.rgn_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSR as WTD_WGE from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.rgn_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSR) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSR,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSR) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select h.rgn_no,h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no) h group by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no order by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no) f /* UNION select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.rgn_no,b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.rgn_no,b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.rgn_no order by actl_pln.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSR as WTD_HRS from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.rgn_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSR) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSR,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSR) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select h.rgn_no,h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no) h group by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no order by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no) f /* UNION select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.rgn_no,b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.rgn_no,b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.rgn_no order by actl_pln.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no) hrs where wge.rgn_no=hrs.rgn_no order by wge.rgn_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.rgn_no) actl where pln.rgn_no=actl.rgn_no order by pln.rgn_no

TCName.name: WagesPercentageColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentage: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wed,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wed,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.wed / sls.wed)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.sat,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sat,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sat / sls.sat)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.sun,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sun,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sun / sls.sun)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and TCName.PlannedWagesPercentageTotal: select wge.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wed,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wed,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.wed / sls.wed)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.sat,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sat,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sat / sls.sat)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.sun,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sun,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sun / sls.sun)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.rgn_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) z) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by b.rgn_no) x ) z) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by wge.rgn_no
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentageWkToDt: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.PLN_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.PLN_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.PLN_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.PLN_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.PLN_WGE_DTSR / sls.PLN_SLS_DTSR)*100,2),0) END as PLN_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_DTS,0) as PLN_WGE_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,sls.wtd as PLN_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentageWkToDtTotal: select wge.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100,2),0) END as PLN_WGEPCT_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG,0) as wtd from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,sls.wtd from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select
