TCName.BudgetWagePercentage: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR / sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSR)*100,2),0) END as BDGT_WGEPCT_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,bdgt.BDGT_WAGE_DTSR as BDGT_WGE_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,bdgt.BDGT_SALES_DTSR as BDGT_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.BudgetWagePercentageTotal: select wge.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR)*100,2),0) END as BDGT_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,bdgt.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_DTSR as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_TOT_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) bdgt on lc.rgn_no=bdgt.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,bdgt.BDGT_SALES_TOT_DTSR as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,sum(e.bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES_TOT_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) bdgt on lc.rgn_no=bdgt.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by wge.rgn_no
TCName.ForecastWagePercentage: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_DTSR / sls.FCST_SLS_DTSR)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGEPCT_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,fcst.FCST_WAGE_DTSR as FCST_WGE_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,fcst.FCST_SALES_DTSR as FCST_SLS_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.ForecastWagePercentageTotal: select wge.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR / sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,fcst.FCST_WAGE_TOT_DTSR as FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,sum(e.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_TOT_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) fcst on lc.rgn_no=fcst.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,fcst.FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSR as FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,sum(e.frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSR from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.rgn_no order by e.rgn_no) fcst on lc.rgn_no=fcst.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by wge.rgn_no
TCName.PastWeekActualWagesPercentage: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.wed / sls.wed)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sat / sls.sat)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sun / sls.sun)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS) as ACTL_WGE_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.zone_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by TCName.PastWeekVarWagesPercentageWkToDt: select pln.zone_no,ROUND(actl.ACTL_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR - pln.PLN_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR,2) as VAR_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR from (select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND TCName.PastWeekVarWagesPercentageWkToDtTotal: select pln.rgn_no,ROUND(actl.ACTL_WGEPCT_WTDTOT_DTSR - pln.PLN_WGEPCT_WTDTOT_DTSR,2) as VAR_WGEPCT_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select wge.rgn_no, CASE WHEN lc.rgn_no,wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG as wtd from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.rgn_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG from (select (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Wed, TCName.CurrentWeekVarWagesPercentageWkToDt: select pln.zone_no,ROUND(actl.ACTL_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR - pln.PLN_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR,2) as VAR_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR from (select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND(((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100),2),0) END as PLN_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,(wge.PLN_WAGE_DTS) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,sls.wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and sls.WTD)*100),2),0) END as ACTL_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSR as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq from (select * from (select h.rgn_no,h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no) h group by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no order by h.rgn_no,h.zone_no) f /* UNION select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.rgn_no order by actl_pln.rgn_no) wge on wge.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,sls.wtd as WTD from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select * from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls /* where (pln_sls.rgn_no,pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and ) z) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no) actl where pln.rgn_no=actl.rgn_no order by pln.rgn_no
TCName.CurrentWeekEstimatedFcstWagePrcnt: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100,2),0) END as ESTD_WGEPCT_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSR as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.zone_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSR) as ACTL_WGE_DTSR,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSR) as ACTL_HRS_DTSR from (select * from (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSR,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) f /* UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSR, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSR from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' group by loc_no,dept_no) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,sls.wtd as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSR from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and ) z) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by wge.rgn_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarWagesPrecentage: select estd_fcst.zone_no,ROUND((estd_fcst.ESTD_WGEPCT_DTSR - bdgt.BDGT_WGEPCT_DTSR),2) as BDGT_VAR_WGEPCT_DTSR from (select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND(((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100),2),0) END as ESTD_WGEPCT_DTSR from (select actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.dly_wage_dte) in (select loc_no,dept_no,max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) g */) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSR)),0) Wed, b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) estd_fcst, (select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSR,0)=0 AND a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no and lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no TCName.CurrentWeekVarWagesPrecentageTotal: select estd_fcst.rgn_no,ROUND((estd_fcst.ESTD_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSR - bdgt.BDGT_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSR),2) as BDGT_VAR_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSR from (select wge.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND(((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100),2),0) END as ESTD_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSR as WTD from (select distinct b.rgn_no from loc b where b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.rgn_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSR) as b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls /* where (pln_sls.rgn_no,pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) z) sls on lc.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no) estd_fcst, (select wge.rgn_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR / sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,sum(fcst.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.rgn_no=fcst.rgn_no group by lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) wge, (select lc.rgn_no,sum(fcst.frcst_sls) as FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.rgn_no=fcst.rgn_no group by lc.rgn_no order by lc.rgn_no) sls where wge.rgn_no=sls.rgn_no order by wge.rgn_no) fcst where estd_fcst.rgn_no=fcst.rgn_no order by estd_fcst.rgn_no

TCName.name: SMSColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedSMS: select lc.zone_no,nvl(sms.mon,0) as mon,nvl(sms.tue,0) as tue,nvl(sms.wed,0) as wed,nvl(sms.thu,0) as thu,nvl(sms.fri,0) as fri, nvl(sms.sat,0) as sat,nvl(sms.sun,0) as sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedSMSTotal: select lc.rgn_no,sms.mon,sms.tue,sms.wed,sms.thu,sms.fri,sms.sat,sms.sun from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no order by sms.rgn_no
TCName.PlannedSMSWkToDt: select lc.zone_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTD_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedSMSWkToDtTotal: select lc.rgn_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no
TCName.PastWeekActualSMS: select e.zone_no,nvl(sms_src.Monday,0) as mon,nvl(sms_src.Tuesday,0) as tue,nvl(sms_src.Wednesday,0) as Wed, nvl(sms_src.Thursday,0) as thu,nvl(sms_src.Friday,0) as fri,nvl(sms_src.Saturday,0) as sat,nvl(sms_src.Sunday,0) as sun from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by zone_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select zone_no , nvl(round(Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Monday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Tuesday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Wednesday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Thursday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Friday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Saturday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,27,28) order by src.zone_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by zone_no) sms_src on sms_src.zone_no=e.zone_no order by e.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualSMSTotal: select sms.rgn_no,nvl(sum(sms.Monday),0) as MON_TOT,nvl(sum(sms.Tuesday),0) as TUE_TOT,sum(sms.Wednesday)as WED_TOT, sum(sms.Thursday)as THU_TOTAL,sum(sms.Friday) as FRI_TOT,sum(sms.Saturday) as SAT_TOT,sum(sms.Sunday) as SUN_TOT from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,sms_src.Monday,sms_src.Tuesday,sms_src.Wednesday,sms_src.Thursday,sms_src.Friday,sms_src.Saturday,sms_src.Sunday from (select distinct rgn_no,zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by rgn_no,zone_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select rgn_no,zone_no , nvl(round(Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Monday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Tuesday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Wednesday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Thursday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Friday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Saturday, nvl(round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , plan_sms_hrs )),2),0) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,27,28) order by src.zone_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by rgn_no,zone_no) sms_src on sms_src.rgn_no=e.rgn_no and sms_src.zone_no=e.zone_no order by sms_src.rgn_no,sms_src.zone_no) sms group by sms.rgn_no order by sms.rgn_no

TCName.PastWeekVarSMSWkToDt: select pln.zone_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_SMS_WTD_DTSR from (select lc.zone_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln, (select e.zone_no,nvl(sms_src.actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt,0) as WTD from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by zone_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select zone_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,27,28) order by src.zone_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by zone_no) sms_src on sms_src.zone_no=e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no order by pln.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekVarSMSWkToDtTotal: select pln.rgn_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select lc.rgn_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' order by b.rgn_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.rgn_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.rgn_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.rgn_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSR from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.rgn_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.rgn_no order by b.rgn_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.rgn_no=lc.rgn_no) pln, (select sms.rgn_no,nvl(sum(sms.actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt),0) as WTD from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct rgn_no,zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by rgn_no,zone_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select rgn_no,zone_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,27,28) order by src.zone_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by rgn_no,zone_no order by rgn_no,zone_no) sms_src on sms_src.zone_no=e.zone_no order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no) sms group by sms.rgn_no order by sms.rgn_no) actl where pln.rgn_no=actl.rgn_no order by pln.rgn_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualSMS: select lc.zone_no, NVL(ROUND(xy.Monday,2),0) as mon,NVL(ROUND(xy.Tuesday,2),0) as tue,NVL(ROUND(xy.Wednesday,2),0) as wed,NVL(ROUND(xy.Thursday,2),0) as thu, zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.zone_no,sum(xyz.monday) as Monday,sum(xyz.tuesday) as Tuesday,sum(xyz.wednesday) as Wednesday,sum(xyz.thursday) as Thursday, sum(xyz.friday) as Friday,sum(xyz.saturday) as Saturday,sum(xyz.sunday) as Sunday from (select * from (select zone_no, NVL(Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , ACTL_SMS_DTSR )),0) Monday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , ACTL_SMS_DTSR )),0) Tuesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , ACTL_SMS_DTSR )),0) Wednesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , ACTL_SMS_DTSR )),0) Thursday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , ACTL_SMS_DTSR )),0) Friday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , ACTL_SMS_DTSR )),0) Saturday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , ACTL_SMS_DTSR )),0) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSR from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by zone_no order by zone_no) xy /* UNION select * from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSR)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSR from (select e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and (b.zone_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.zone_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join TCName.CurrentWeekActualSMSTotal: select lc.rgn_no, NVL(ROUND(xy.Monday,2),0) as mon,NVL(ROUND(xy.Tuesday,2),0) as tue,NVL(ROUND(xy.Wednesday,2),0) as wed,NVL(ROUND(xy.Thursday,2),0) as thu,
